data.name: Granmarg the Mega Monarch
data.desc:
You can Tribute Summon this card by Tributing 1 Tribute Summoned monster. When this card is Tribute Summoned: Target up to 2 Set cards on the field; destroy those targets. If this card was Tribute Summoned by Tributing an EARTH monster, add this additional effect.
‚óè Also, draw 1 card after that.
